function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased cases leading to more innovation in technological solutions for COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of dependence on technology for disease tracking and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Diversification of disease tracking methods, training on non-technology-dependent protocols","Technologies":"Non-technology dependent disease tracking methods, manual resource allocation protocols","People":"Healthcare workers, government authorities","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Great communication between the public and government for disease prevention","Impact":"Potential reliance on internet-based applications for critical information dissemination","Mitigation":"Developing alternative communication channels, ensuring access for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Alternative communication technologies, targeted information dissemination platforms","People":"General public, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government authorities, community organizations"},{"Description":"Advancements in mobile technology for precise positioning of hotspots and relief approaches","Impact":"Potential over-reliance on mobile technology for hotspot tracking and relief operations","Mitigation":"Training on non-technology dependent hotspot tracking, backup relief approaches","Technologies":"Non-technology dependent hotspot tracking methods, backup relief approaches","People":"Relief workers, government agencies","Owner":"Relief organizations, government authorities"}]}
